Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show a problem where people need to communicate over a distance.
The student can draw a string telephone using the materials provided.
The student can show how the string telephone allows communication between two people using sound.
The student can illustrate the device effectively sending and receiving sound information over a distance.
The student can depict how people use the string telephone to solve the communication problem.
The student can highlight the importance of technology in connecting people over long distances.
